name: Pyrex Source Code File
summary: Learn about .PYX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Since Pyrex is used for writing modules for Python software, PYX files may sometimes be found with Python applications.
NOTE: Cython is an extension of Pyrex that contains several enhancements. Developers often prefer Cython to Pyrex.

instructions: You can open a PYX file and edit the source code it contains with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other source code editor.
To use a PYX file with Pyrex (multiplatform) or Cython (multiplatform), refer to those programs' documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pyx file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: PYX file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
